meanings.definition: A person who shines shoes for a living.
meanings.sent1: The bootblacks in the city square work hard to make shoes shine.
meanings.sent2: I saw a bootblacks at the train station offering to shine shoes for a few dollars.
meanings.sent3: The bootblacks joked with customers, saying they could make shoes sparkle like diamonds.
meanings.sent4: The bootblacks were like magicians, transforming dull shoes into glossy works of art.
meanings.sent5: The bootblacks' skill at shining shoes amazed everyone who passed by.

meanings.sent1: Shoe shining is a service many bootblacks provide in the city.
meanings.sent2: The bootblacks' boot shining technique was impeccable.
meanings.sent3: The bootblacks turned shoe shining into a fun and entertaining performance.
meanings.sent4: The bootblacks' dedication to shoe shining was evident in their meticulous work.
meanings.sent5: The bootblacks' passion for shoe shining was contagious among customers.

meanings.sent1: The bootblacks' shoe shining business was thriving in the busy downtown area.
meanings.sent2: Bootblacks often set up their shoe shining stands near office buildings.
meanings.sent3: The bootblacks' shoe shining business was so successful, they expanded to other cities.
meanings.sent4: The bootblacks' shoe shining business was a shining example of entrepreneurship.
meanings.sent5: The bootblacks' shoe shining business attracted a loyal clientele with their excellent service.
